Residential Filters System Explore our range of filters designed packages for residential use. Package 1: Multimedia
Four Stages
A multimedia filter removes suspended solids from water by using multiple layers of media.
Package 2: Multimedia Softener Four Stages
Reduces water hardness by removing calcium and magnesium, protecting appliances and fixtures from scaling or from the build of hard water marks.
Package 3: Multimedia Softener Four Stages with Mini RO
An electric or battery-powered mechanism that automates the purification process.
Package 4: Multimedia Carbon Softener Four Stages
Provides a reservoir for your water source in case of a failure in the main water supply, such as water interruption and unstable water pressure.
See more
Commercial Filters System Water filtration systems for commercial. Package 1: Multimedia Softener Four Stage with 400gpd Reverse Osmosis
Advanced water softening and reverse osmosis technology.
Package 2:  3000 GPD Single Membrane Reverse Osmosis (Refilling Station)
Advanced water purification solution designed for refilling station applications.
Package 3:   6000 GPD Dual Membrane Reverse Osmosis (Refilling Station)
High-capacity water purification solution tailored for refilling stations and commercial applications.
See more
Industrial Filters System Advanced water filtration systems for businesses. Package 1:  Industrial Reverse Osmosis
High-capacity water filtration solution designed for large-scale commercial applications, particularly for refilling stations, industrial use, and community water supply needs. Package 2:   Industrial Filtration System
designed to handle large volumes of water efficiently while providing exceptional filtration performance
Ice Maker Machine Reliable equipment for producing high-quality ice for any need. Coming Soon
